name: Tristangular [Windows]
description:
Tristangular is a hard and brain killing game made in 6 hours. There isn't much content to the game however, a boss spawns every 60 to 150 seconds. Which is why, you should play it for at least a minute haha...

It's not the best game, I'm warning you. It's a game made in 6 hours for a gamejam that was supposed to be for a week. The Vimjam2 gamejam.

Don't expect much, but I do argue that you could try the game. Anyway, cya!
